Frank R.

   Ron L

      Guess I'm still learning, and mostly form others here. Bruce claims evryone has a 'technicain' assigned. I dind';t thinjk much of that idea, but it appears i have my own as well. 
 
 "Nancy Will match up the bridge" and "Talking 8(?)-I talk to you"
